author: Austin Evans
description:
Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
Check out our @thisis channel! https://www.youtube.com/thisis
As well as the @Denki channel! https://www.youtube.com/@Denki
Instagram: https://instagram.com/austinnotduncan
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@austinnotduncan

In this deep dive, I explore whether it makes sense to buy a Nintendo Switch in 2025 with the Switch 2 on the horizon. I break down the current pricing of all three Switch models, test how modern games actually run, and share some surprising recommendations that might save you hundreds of dollars. Plus, I may have accidentally broken my Switch Lite during filming...

0:00 Intro
0:32 OG Switch
2:43 Switch Lite
4:37 Switch OLED
6:34 Fortnite
7:45 Pokemon Scarlet and Violet

10:10 The Switch 2...
14:31 Buy (or Sell) the Switch 1?
title: Should You Buy a Switch in 2025?
